article.title: Taliaferro Assigned to NATO Air Command-Afghanistan
article.text: Brig. Gen. Jeffrey B. Taliaferro, USAF, has been assigned as commander, 9th Air and Space Expeditionary Task Force-Afghanistan; commander, NATO Air Command-Afghanistan; director, Air Forces Central Command Air Component Coordination Element for U.S. Forces-Afghanistan, Air Combat Command, and support of NATOâ€™s Operation Resolute Support, deputy commander-air, U.S. Forces-Afghanistan, U.S. Central Command, Kabul, Afghanistan.
